Take note this is what that missile can do. MY BEST HIT on Queen Elizabeth II (1 out of 3 shots, not bad! agile, easy to use and powerful)

*sends submarine to the depths of the Kerbin Ocean*

Guess were on a stalemate for now. I'll be plotting my next move for our next encounter. That was kind of Fun (Don't worry my military forces are limited for now. It will build up in the Future)

Meanwhile here is my upcoming ship in development for the Duna Battle.

Here, is a cutaway version of it just to peek the insides. Take note of it's compartments and quadruple layer armor. (Yes it has no engines. The fuel tanks are everywhere on purpose) What do you think?

Could someone test the armour on my ship? I'm curious of how strong she is but it's unlikely in a battle situation that I would be firing my missiles at my ship.

It's 580ish parts (mostly struts).

Here is a download.

Not to rain on your parade, Andrew and Zamo, but do you think you should tone down the roleplaying a little bit? How about you have an actual battle? That hasn't happened for... a really long time here.

Now that it's the weekend, I'm really hoping that this battle starts (Zamo and Script?)

Yup. Me, three and you are set up. Here it is: https://www.dropbox.com/s/m60se750ejm4f83/persistent.sfs?dl=0

Not to rain on your parade, Andrew and Zamo, but do you think you should tone down the roleplaying a little bit? How about you have an actual battle? That hasn't happened for... a really long time here.

Because of finals. I'm taking an AP World exam in one hour. XD

-Initiate cram session-

Also, I'd gladly fight spartwo in a naval battle. (And Zamonivar.)

I just need to arm my warship with a few more cruise missiles. I originally intended on using the empty space for a landing pad, but it'd just turn into a structural/exposed liability area.

Ok the thread is getting quite populated I'm getting quite confused, who's turn is it? what order are we on? I'll summarize here, someone correct me if I'm wrong.

1. The upcoming Duna battle includes, Three1415, andrew123, ejudedude13, sdj64, ScriptKitt3h and Me. (Am I right? we)

2. andrew123 is craving for some naval battle with Spartwo and Me (It will be a while cause I'm still working on my Submarine or probably a new ship)

3. There is another battle brewing on Eve right? between Mr Tegu and Spartwo (In which I might partake depending on how the Duna battle goes)

4. Megalodon 720 wants his ship tested (I'll get on that)

I'll be preparing my ship and send it later, could somebody please link here again the current duna battle persistent file or send it to me through message.

Everything else is correct.

Edit: We are doing this battle in 0.25, not 0.90, so you guys had better have a copy of 0.25

If anyone is up for a tank battle, I'll gladly join

Im working on some tanks. It will take some time though. Im in the middle of designing a hypersonic missile for tank combat. So far its max speed is 546m/s. But its not very deadly. I still need to mak it longer.

Ok, the turns for duna battle are three, me, sdj, skript then you.

Everything else is correct.

Edit: We are doing this battle in 0.25, not 0.90, so you guys had better have a copy of 0.25

I do not have a copy of 0.25, and I'm not quite sure why that'd be necessary, considering that unless anyone's using .90 MK3 parts, it should port over quite easily.

Unless, of course, someone's being stubborn and not getting the new update.

The tank im working on has amazingly strong armour. Wanna test anyone? Mind you, dont go fast, turn fast or brake. Use S to slow down. The wheels will break and you will be stuck. Use a pilot and two engineers. The two engineers in the gun commanders positions. If the wheels break, use the enginneers to repair.

The tank im working on has amazingly strong armour. Wanna test anyone? Mind you, dont go fast, turn fast or brake. Use S to slow down. The wheels will break and you will be stuck. Use a pilot and two engineers. The two engineers in the gun commanders positions. If the wheels break, use the enginneers to repair.

A missile that goes 600m/s is pretty impressive, my 88mm I-beam cannons top out at around 300m/s. I'm curious though, how large is the shell and is the impact tolerance higher or equal to that of structural plating?

I do not have a copy of 0.25, and I'm not quite sure why that'd be necessary, considering that unless anyone's using .90 MK3 parts, it should port over quite easily.

Unless, of course, someone's being stubborn and not getting the new update.

I used to have the cracked version of ksp, but then I bought it because I was tired of waiting for updates (You might have mods you want to save)

I suggest you do a fresh new download of the new version however, I tried to patch 0.25 and it broke the game.

Its an ibeam pocket edition with 16 seps that are rifled and a cubic strut at the bottom. the strut gets overheated by 6 sepetrons pointed at it and it explodes, propelling the round at 546m/s max. The larger version tops at around 300m/s. Its 2 ibeam pockets.

Can we make it 500 tons, my battlecruiser is actually 300 tons and I had to add drop tanks to the cruisers cause the fuel in the mk2 parts is so low?

Dayum, that's a dreadnought. If the ship number can be brought up by 1.

did somebody say dreadnought? Holy Mass! that's bigger than my dreadnought at 276.84 tons and I thought mine was big. (It's designed as Eye Candy though and not that tough)

Ok, the turns for duna battle are three, me, sdj, skript then you.

Everything else is correct.

Edit: We are doing this battle in 0.25, not 0.90, so you guys had better have a copy of 0.25

Presenting my new cruiser,

K.R.K.N. Fleet (Kraken Technologies)

Class: Cruiser

Name: "Atlantis"

Model: 2

Cost: 200356.0

Part Count: 673 parts in 16 stages (689 during launch)

Total Mass: 143.74 tons

Armament: Equipped with 8 New generation space missiles (Newly developed Warheads). Missiles can be used as long range cruise missile (for ship interception) or direct fire (for close-encounters)

Armor and Constuction: Basic rigid structure with overall quadruple layered armor. 5-6 layers of armor on the side engines with simple strut reinforcements.

Powerplant and Propulsion: 4 thermoelectric generators. 4 Nuclear Engines, with basic fuel. (Fuel of 4700+ fully armed and around 3500+ fuel unarmed)

I'll be using two (2) of this 140 cruisers for the Duna battle instead of my 250 ton heavy cruiser/battlecruiser (300 is our limit right?). Please reply a.s.a.p. and post again the persistent file so that I could set up my ships quickly and let's start this battle as soon as we can.
